type.name: org.gradle.plugin.repository.IvyPluginRepository
type.description: * Represents an Ivy repository which contains Gradle plugins.

method.name: getUrl
method.description: * The base URL of this repository. This URL is used to find Gradle plugins. * * @return The URL.

method.name: setUrl
method.description:
* Sets the base URL of this repository. This URL is used to find Gradle plugins. * *

The provided value is evaluated relative to the build's directory. This * means, for example, you can pass in a {@code File} object, or a relative path to be * evaluated relative to the directory of the {@code settings.gradle} file in which this * repository is declared. * * @param url The base URL.

property.name: url
property.description: * The base URL of this repository. This URL is used to find Gradle plugins. * * @return The URL.
